00074 Style defaultStyle = {
00075       Spatium(8.0),   // staffUpperBorder
00076       Spatium(4.0),   // staffLowerBorder
00077       Spatium(6.5),   // staffDistance  5.5
00078       Spatium(6.5),   // accoladeDistance 5.5
00079       Spatium(9.25),  // systemDistance 9.25
00080 
00081       Spatium(4.0),   // minMeasureWidth  12.0
00082       Spatium(0.16),  // barWidth;
00083       Spatium(0.16),  // doubleBarWidth;
00084       Spatium(0.4),   // endBarWidth (.5)
00085       Spatium(0.30),  // doubleBarDistance;
00086       Spatium(0.30),  // endBarDistance
00087 
00088       Spatium(0.5),   // clefLeftMargin;
00089       Spatium(0.5),   // keysig left margin
00090       Spatium(0.5),   // timesigLeftMargin
00091       Spatium(1.75),  // clef/key/sig right margin
00092 
00093       Spatium(0.13),  // stemWidth = 1.3 * staffLineWidth
00094 
00095       Spatium(.5),    // minNoteDistance
00096       Spatium(1.5),   // barNoteDistance
00097       Spatium(1.0),   // noteBarDistance
00098 
00099       1.0,              // spacing16;
00100       1.4,              // spacing8;
00101       1.8,              // spacing4;
00102       2.2,              // spacing2;
00103 
00104       1.5,              // measureSpacing
00105 
00106       Spatium(0.08),    // staff line width
00107       Spatium(0.16),    // helpLineWidth;
00108       Spatium(1.6),     // akkoladeWidth;
00109       Spatium(0.16),    // akkoladeDistance;
00110       Spatium(0.13),    // prefixDistance
00111 
00112       Spatium(0.22),    // prefixNoteDistance
00113 
00114       Spatium(0.48),    // beamWidth
00115       0.5,              // beamDistance, units of beamWidth
00116       Spatium(1.25),    // beamMinLen, len for broken beams
00117       0.03,             // beamMinSteigung
00118       0.07,             // beamMaxSteigung
00119       division,         //  maxBeamTicks : 1/4 or 1/2 groups
00120       Spatium(0.5),     // dotNoteDistance
00121       Spatium(0.25),    // dotRestDistance
00122       Spatium(0.5),     // dotDotDistance
00123       Spatium(0.5),     // propertyDistanceHead
00124       Spatium(0.5),     // propertyDistanceStem; note property to note stem
00125       Spatium(0.25),    // propertyDistance; note property to note property
00126       .5,               // ticklen2Width
00127       0.3,              // pageFillLimit
00128       Spatium(1.5),     // hairpinHeight
00129       Spatium(0.5),     // hairpinContHeight
00130       Spatium(0.13),    // hairpinWidth
00131 
00132       true,             // showPageNumber
00133       false,            // showPageNumberOne
00134       true,             // pageNumberOddEven
00135       true,             // showMeasureNumber
00136       false,            // showMeasureNumberOne
00137       5,                // measureNumberInterval;
00138       true,             // measureNumberSystem
00139       false,            // showMeasureNumberAllStaffs
00140       };

00142 //---------------------------------------------------------
00143 //   setDefaultStyle
00144 //---------------------------------------------------------
00145 
00146 void setDefaultStyle()
00147       {
00148       style = &defaultStyle;
00149       int n = sizeof(defaultTextStyles)/sizeof(*defaultTextStyles);
00150       textStyles.clear();
00151       for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00152             textStyles.push_back(defaultTextStyles[i]);
00153       }
00154 
00155 //---------------------------------------------------------
00156 //   write
00157 //---------------------------------------------------------
00158 
00159 void TextStyle::write(Xml& xml)
00160       {
00161       xml.tag("TextStyle");
00162       xml.strTag("name", name);
00163       xml.strTag("family", family);
00164       xml.intTag("size", size);
00165       xml.intTag("bold", bold);
00166       xml.intTag("italic", italic);
00167       xml.intTag("underline", underline);
00168       xml.intTag("align", align);
00169       xml.intTag("anchor", anchor);
00170       xml.intTag("offsetType", offsetType);
00171       if (offsetType == OFFSET_ABS || offsetType == OFFSET_REL) {
00172             xml.doubleTag("xoffset", xoff / DPMM);
00173             xml.doubleTag("yoffset", yoff /DPMM);
00174             }
00175       else {
00176             xml.doubleTag("xoffset", xoff);
00177             xml.doubleTag("yoffset", yoff);
00178             }
00179       xml.etag("TextStyle");
00180       }
00181 
00182 //---------------------------------------------------------
00183 //   read
00184 //---------------------------------------------------------
00185 
00186 void TextStyle::read(QDomNode node)
00187       {
00188       node = node.firstChild();
00189       while (!node.isNull()) {
00190             QDomElement e = node.toElement();
00191             QString tag(e.tagName());
00192             QString val(e.text());
00193             int i = val.toInt();
00194 
00195             if (tag == "name")
00196                   name = val;
00197             else if (tag == "family")
00198                   family = val;
00199             else if (tag == "size")
00200                   size = i;
00201             else if (tag == "bold")
00202                   bold = i;
00203             else if (tag == "italic")
00204                   italic = i;
00205             else if (tag == "underline")
00206                   underline = i;
00207             else if (tag == "align")
00208                   align = i;
00209             else if (tag == "anchor")
00210                   anchor = (Anchor)i;
00211             else if (tag == "xoffset")
00212                   xoff = val.toDouble();
00213             else if (tag == "yoffset")
00214                   yoff = val.toDouble();
00215             else if (tag == "offsetType")
00216                   offsetType = (OffsetType)i;
00217             else
00218                   printf("Mscore:TextStyle: unknown tag %s\n",
00219                      tag.latin1());
00220             node = node.nextSibling();
00221             }
00222       if (offsetType == OFFSET_ABS || offsetType == OFFSET_REL) {
00223             xoff *= DPMM;
00224             yoff *= DPMM;
00225             }
00226       }
00227 
00228 //---------------------------------------------------------
00229 //   setTextStyle
00230 //---------------------------------------------------------
00231 
00232 void setTextStyle(const TextStyle& ts)
00233       {
00234       for (iTextStyle i = textStyles.begin(); i != textStyles.end(); ++i) {
00235             if (i->name == ts.name) {
00236                   *i = ts;
00237                   return;
00238                   }
00239             }
00240       textStyles.push_back(ts);
00241       }
00242 
00243 //---------------------------------------------------------
00244 //   loadStyle
00245 //---------------------------------------------------------
00246 
00247 void loadStyle(QDomNode node)
00248       {
00249       node = node.firstChild();
00250       while (!node.isNull()) {
00251             QDomElement e = node.toElement();
00252             QString tag(e.tagName());
00253             QString val(e.text());
00254             int i = val.toInt();
00255             double d = val.toDouble();
00256 
00257             if (tag == "TextStyle") {
00258                   TextStyle ts;
00259                   ts.read(node);
00260                   setTextStyle(ts);
00261                   }
00262             else if (tag == "staffUpperBorder")
00263                   style->staffUpperBorder = Spatium(d);
00264             else if (tag == "staffLowerBorder")
00265                   ::style->staffLowerBorder = Spatium(d);
00266             else if (tag == "staffDistance")
00267                   ::style->staffDistance = Spatium(d);
00268             else if (tag == "systemDistance")
00269                   ::style->systemDistance = Spatium(d);
00270             else if (tag == "minMeasureWidth")
00271                   ::style->minMeasureWidth = Spatium(d);
00272             else if (tag == "barWidth")
00273                   ::style->barWidth = Spatium(d);
00274             else if (tag == "doubleBarWidth")
00275                   ::style->doubleBarWidth = Spatium(d);
00276             else if (tag == "endBarWidth")
00277                   ::style->endBarWidth = Spatium(d);
00278             else if (tag == "doubleBarDistance")
00279                   ::style->doubleBarDistance = Spatium(d);
00280             else if (tag == "endBarDistance")
00281                   ::style->endBarDistance = Spatium(d);
00282             else if (tag == "clefLeftMargin")
00283                   ::style->clefLeftMargin = Spatium(d);
00284             else if (tag == "keysigLeftMargin")
00285                   ::style->keysigLeftMargin = Spatium(d);
00286             else if (tag == "timesigLeftMargin")
00287                   ::style->timesigLeftMargin = Spatium(d);
00288             else if (tag == "clefKeyRightMargin")
00289                   ::style->clefKeyRightMargin = Spatium(d);
00290             else if (tag == "stemWidth")
00291                   ::style->stemWidth = Spatium(d);
00292             else if (tag == "minNoteDistance")
00293                   ::style->minNoteDistance = Spatium(d);
00294             else if (tag == "spacing16")
00295                   ::style->spacing16 = d;
00296             else if (tag == "spacing8")
00297                   ::style->spacing8 = d;
00298             else if (tag == "spacing4")
00299                   ::style->spacing4 = d;
00300             else if (tag == "spacing2")
00301                   ::style->spacing2 = d;
00302             else if (tag == "measureSpacing")
00303                   ::style->measureSpacing = d;
00304             else if (tag == "barNoteDistance")
00305                   ::style->barNoteDistance = Spatium(d);
00306             else if (tag == "noteBarDistance")
00307                   ::style->noteBarDistance = Spatium(d);
00308             else if (tag == "staffLineWidth")
00309                   ::style->staffLineWidth = Spatium(d);
00310             else if (tag == "helpLineWidth")
00311                   ::style->helpLineWidth = Spatium(d);
00312             else if (tag == "akkoladeWidth")
00313                   ::style->akkoladeWidth = Spatium(d);
00314             else if (tag == "akkoladeDistance")
00315                   ::style->akkoladeDistance = Spatium(d);
00316             else if (tag == "prefixDistance")
00317                   ::style->prefixDistance = Spatium(d);
00318             else if (tag == "prefixNoteDistance")
00319                   ::style->prefixNoteDistance = Spatium(d);
00320             else if (tag == "beamWidth")
00321                   ::style->beamWidth = Spatium(d);
00322             else if (tag == "beamDistance")
00323                   ::style->beamDistance = d;
00324             else if (tag == "beamMinLen")
00325                   ::style->beamMinLen = Spatium(d);
00326             else if (tag == "beamMinSteigung")
00327                   ::style->beamMinSteigung = d;
00328             else if (tag == "beamMaxSteigung")
00329                   ::style->beamMaxSteigung = d;
00330             else if (tag == "maxBeamTicks")
00331                   ::style->maxBeamTicks = i;
00332             else if (tag == "dotNoteDistance")
00333                   ::style->dotNoteDistance = Spatium(d);
00334             else if (tag == "dotRestDistance")
00335                   ::style->dotRestDistance = Spatium(d);
00336             else if (tag == "dotDotDistance")
00337                   ::style->dotDotDistance = Spatium(d);
00338             else if (tag == "propertyDistanceHead")
00339                   ::style->propertyDistanceHead = Spatium(d);
00340             else if (tag == "propertyDistanceStem")
00341                   ::style->propertyDistanceStem = Spatium(d);
00342             else if (tag == "propertyDistance")
00343                   ::style->propertyDistance = Spatium(d);
00344             else if (tag == "ticklen2Width")
00345                   ::style->ticklen2Width = d;
00346             else if (tag == "pageFillLimit")
00347                   ::style->pageFillLimit = d;
00348             else if (tag == "hairpinHeight")
00349                   ::style->hairpinHeight = Spatium(d);
00350             else if (tag == "hairpinContHeight")
00351                   ::style->hairpinContHeight = Spatium(d);
00352             else if (tag == "hairpinWidth")
00353                   ::style->hairpinWidth = Spatium(d);
00354             else if (tag == "showPageNumber")
00355                   ::style->showPageNumber = i;
00356             else if (tag == "showPageNumberOne")
00357                   ::style->showPageNumberOne = i;
00358             else if (tag == "pageNumberOddEven")
00359                   ::style->pageNumberOddEven = i;
00360             else if (tag == "showMeasureNumber")
00361                   ::style->showMeasureNumber = i;
00362             else if (tag == "showMeasureNumberOne")
00363                   ::style->showMeasureNumberOne = i;
00364             else if (tag == "measureNumberInterval")
00365                   ::style->measureNumberInterval = i;
00366             else if (tag == "measureNumberSystem")
00367                   ::style->measureNumberSystem = i;
00368             else if (tag == "measureNumberAllStaffs")
00369                   ::style->measureNumberAllStaffs = i;
00370             else
00371                   printf("Mscore:Style: unknown tag %s\n",
00372                      tag.latin1());
00373             node = node.nextSibling();
00374             }
00375       }

00380 
00381 void saveStyle(Xml& xml)
00382       {
00383       xml.tag("Style");
00384       for (iTextStyle i = textStyles.begin(); i != textStyles.end(); ++i)
00385            i->write(xml);
00386       xml.doubleTag("staffUpperBorder",       style->staffUpperBorder.val());
00387       xml.doubleTag("staffLowerBorder",       style->staffLowerBorder.val());
00388       xml.doubleTag("staffDistance",          style->staffDistance.val());
00389       xml.doubleTag("systemDistance",         style->systemDistance.val());
00390       xml.doubleTag("minMeasureWidth",        style->minMeasureWidth.val());
00391       xml.doubleTag("barWidth",               style->barWidth.val());
00392       xml.doubleTag("doubleBarWidth",         style->doubleBarWidth.val());
00393       xml.doubleTag("endBarWidth",            style->endBarWidth.val());
00394       xml.doubleTag("doubleBarDistance",      style->doubleBarDistance.val());
00395       xml.doubleTag("endBarDistance",         style->endBarDistance.val());
00396       xml.doubleTag("clefLeftMargin",         style->clefLeftMargin.val());
00397       xml.doubleTag("keysigLeftMargin",       style->keysigLeftMargin.val());
00398       xml.doubleTag("timesigLeftMargin",      style->timesigLeftMargin.val());
00399       xml.doubleTag("clefKeyRightMargin",     style->clefKeyRightMargin.val());
00400       xml.doubleTag("stemWidth",              style->stemWidth.val());
00401       xml.doubleTag("minNoteDistance",        style->minNoteDistance.val());
00402 
00403       xml.doubleTag("spacing16",              style->spacing16);
00404       xml.doubleTag("spacing8",               style->spacing8);
00405       xml.doubleTag("spacing4",               style->spacing4);
00406       xml.doubleTag("spacing2",               style->spacing2);
00407       xml.doubleTag("measureSpacing",         style->measureSpacing);
00408

00410       xml.doubleTag("noteBarDistance",        style->noteBarDistance.val());
00411       xml.doubleTag("staffLineWidth",         style->staffLineWidth.val());
00412       xml.doubleTag("helpLineWidth",          style->helpLineWidth.val());
